TheSimpletonMod:AbyssShockwave.NAME: Abyss Shockwave
TheSimpletonMod:AbyssShockwave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If you have any Curse in your hand, deal same damage again.

TheSimpletonMod:AntiAging.NAME: Anti-Aging
TheSimpletonMod:AntiAging.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Ritual : Raise your max HP by !M!. NL Exhaust.

TheSimpletonMod:BlessingInDisguise.NAME: Blessing in Disguise
TheSimpletonMod:BlessingInDisguise.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Curse cards in your hand. NL Gain !B! Block for each card Exhausted.

TheSimpletonMod:BloodBarrier.NAME: Blood Barrier
TheSimpletonMod:BloodBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Ritual : Gain Block equal to your max HP minus your current HP. NL Exhaust.

TheSimpletonMod:CircleOfAbyss.NAME: Circle of Abyss
TheSimpletonMod:CircleOfAbyss.DESCRIPTION: Circle. NL Whenever you play a card, gain !M! Block. NL If this card is Exhausted, gain [E].
TheSimpletonMod:CircleOfAbyss.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Circle. NL Whenever you play a card, gain !M! Block. NL If this card is Exhausted, NL gain [E] [E].

TheSimpletonMod:CircleOfAmplification.NAME: Circle of Amplification
TheSimpletonMod:CircleOfAmplification.DESCRIPTION: Circle. NL Whenever you play a Power card, draw 1 card. NL Ethereal.
TheSimpletonMod:CircleOfAmplification.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Circle. NL Whenever you play a Power card, gain [E] and draw 1 card. NL Ethereal.

TheSimpletonMod:CircleOfBlood.NAME: Circle of Blood
TheSimpletonMod:CircleOfBlood.DESCRIPTION: Circle. NL Whenever you play an Attack card, heal !M! HP. NL Ethereal.

TheSimpletonMod:CircleOfCorruption.NAME: Circle of Corruption
TheSimpletonMod:CircleOfCorruption.DESCRIPTION: Circle. NL Whenever you play a Skill card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

TheSimpletonMod:CircleOfFlame.NAME: Circle of Flame
TheSimpletonMod:CircleOfFlame.DESCRIPTION: Circle. NL Whenever you play an Attack card, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

TheSimpletonMod:CircleOfFocus.NAME: Circle of Focus
TheSimpletonMod:CircleOfFocus.DESCRIPTION: Circle. NL Whenever you play a card that costs !M! or more, gain [E].

TheSimpletonMod:CircleOfWindfury.NAME: Circle of Windfury
TheSimpletonMod:CircleOfWindfury.DESCRIPTION: Circle. NL Whenever you play a cost 0 card, draw 1 card. NL Ethereal.
TheSimpletonMod:CircleOfWindfury.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Circle. NL Whenever you play a cost 0 card, draw 1 card.

TheSimpletonMod:CleanUpWorkshop.NAME: Clean up Workshop
TheSimpletonMod:CleanUpWorkshop.DESCRIPTION: Ritual : Gain !B! Block and draw !M! card.
TheSimpletonMod:CleanUpWorkshop.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ritual : Gain !B! Block and draw !M! cards.

TheSimpletonMod:CollectTribute.NAME: Collect Tribute
TheSimpletonMod:CollectTribute.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [E] and add a random Curse card into your hand.
TheSimpletonMod:CollectTribute.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E] and add a random Curse card into your hand.

TheSimpletonMod:CropRotation.NAME: Crop Rotation
TheSimpletonMod:CropRotation.DESCRIPTION: Harvest !M! random crop stack. NL Gain !M! random crop stack.
TheSimpletonMod:CropRotation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Harvest !M! random crop stacks. NL Gain !M! random crop stacks.

TheSimpletonMod:CursedAmulet.NAME: Cursed Amulet
TheSimpletonMod:CursedAmulet.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card. NL Shuffle a random Curse card into your draw pile.

TheSimpletonMod:CursedArmor.NAME: Cursed Armor
TheSimpletonMod:CursedArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle 2 random Curse cards into your draw pile.

TheSimpletonMod:CursedBlade.NAME: Cursed Blade
TheSimpletonMod:CursedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add a Dregs card into your hand.

TheSimpletonMod:CursedBoomerang.NAME: Cursed Boomerang
TheSimpletonMod:CursedBoomerang.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Add a Dregs card into your hand.

TheSimpletonMod:CursedMace.NAME: Cursed Mace
TheSimpletonMod:CursedMace.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Add a Dregs card into your hand.

TheSimpletonMod:CursedRelics.NAME: Cursed Relics
TheSimpletonMod:CursedRelics.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the number of Relics you have. NL Add a Dregs card into your hand.

TheSimpletonMod:CursedShiv.NAME: Cursed Shiv
TheSimpletonMod:CursedShiv.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a Dregs card into your hand.

TheSimpletonMod:CursedSpellbook.NAME: Cursed Spellbook
TheSimpletonMod:CursedSpellbook.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Shuffle a random Curse card into your draw pile.

TheSimpletonMod:CursedStaff.NAME: Cursed Staff
TheSimpletonMod:CursedStaff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 2 Dregs cards into your hand.

TheSimpletonMod:DemonSword.NAME: Demon Sword
TheSimpletonMod:DemonSword.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust all Curse cards in your hand and gain !M! Strength for each Exhausted card.

TheSimpletonMod:DemonicPact.NAME: Demonic Pact
TheSimpletonMod:DemonicPact.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Ritual card, draw 1 card.

TheSimpletonMod:DoubleShield.NAME: Double Shield
TheSimpletonMod:DoubleShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Ritual : Next turn, gain !B! Block.

TheSimpletonMod:EmpowerCircles.NAME: Empower Circles
TheSimpletonMod:EmpowerCircles.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Circle card, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

TheSimpletonMod:Evocation.NAME: Evocation
TheSimpletonMod:Evocation.DESCRIPTION: Ritual : Remove all of your debuffs. NL Exhaust.
TheSimpletonMod:Evocation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ritual : Remove all of your debuffs. If there is no debuff, gain 1 Artifact. NL Exhaust.

TheSimpletonMod:ForbiddenAlchemy.NAME: Forbidden Alchemy
TheSimpletonMod:ForbiddenAlchemy.DESCRIPTION: Ritual : Obtain an Entropic Brew potion. NL Exhaust.

TheSimpletonMod:FuryStrike.NAME: Fury Strike
TheSimpletonMod:FuryStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce the cost of all Strike cards in your hand to 0 this turn.

TheSimpletonMod:Grudge.NAME: Grudge
TheSimpletonMod:Grudge.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Ritual card into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

TheSimpletonMod:Harvest.NAME: Harvest
TheSimpletonMod:Harvest.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Harvest all crops. NL Exhaust.

TheSimpletonMod:Haymaker.NAME: Haymaker
TheSimpletonMod:Haymaker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this kills an enemy, apply !M! Vulnerable and !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

TheSimpletonMod:HellfireBreathing.NAME: Hellfire Breathing
TheSimpletonMod:HellfireBreathing.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Curse card, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

TheSimpletonMod:HellsGateOpen.NAME: Hell's Gate Open
TheSimpletonMod:HellsGateOpen.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random Cursed card into your hand.
TheSimpletonMod:HellsGateOpen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add a random Cursed card into your hand.

TheSimpletonMod:Hemoplague.NAME: Hemoplague
TheSimpletonMod:Hemoplague.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! Bleed to ALL enemies.

TheSimpletonMod:LuckyCharm.NAME: Lucky Charm
TheSimpletonMod:LuckyCharm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a Curse card is drawn or Exhausted, gain !M! Block.

TheSimpletonMod:ManaBullet.NAME: Mana Bullet
TheSimpletonMod:ManaBullet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Curse card in your hand.
TheSimpletonMod:ManaBullet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Unplayable card in your hand.

TheSimpletonMod:ManaCirculation.NAME: Mana Circulation
TheSimpletonMod:ManaCirculation.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a Curse card is Exhausted, gain [E]. NL Ethereal.
TheSimpletonMod:ManaCirculation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever a Curse card is Exhausted, gain [E].

TheSimpletonMod:Mangle.NAME: Mangle
TheSimpletonMod:Mangle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Bleed, NL gain [R] and NL draw 1 card.

TheSimpletonMod:Neurasthenia.NAME: Neurasthenia
TheSimpletonMod:Neurasthenia.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Curse cards in your hand. NL Enemy loses Strength by 1 plus the number of Exhausted cards. NL Exhaust.

TheSimpletonMod:NeowsMight.NAME: Neow's Might
TheSimpletonMod:NeowsMight.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards. NL Reduce the cost of all cards in your hand by 1 this turn. NL Exhaust.

TheSimpletonMod:Obscuration.NAME: Obscuration
TheSimpletonMod:Obscuration.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Ritual : Gain !B! Block again.

TheSimpletonMod:OutForBlood.NAME: Out for Blood
TheSimpletonMod:OutForBlood.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply 1 Bleed.

TheSimpletonMod:ParallelWorld.NAME: Parallel World
TheSimpletonMod:ParallelWorld.DESCRIPTION: Copy all cards in your hand and Shuffle them into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

TheSimpletonMod:PrepareRitual.NAME: Prepare Ritual
TheSimpletonMod:PrepareRitual.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust any number of non-Curse cards, then add that many Dregs cards into your hand. NL Exhaust.
TheSimpletonMod:PrepareRitual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust any number of non-Curse cards, then add that many Dregs cards into your hand.

TheSimpletonMod:RapidMovement.NAME: Rapid Movement
TheSimpletonMod:RapidMovement.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Ritual : Draw !M! cards.

TheSimpletonMod:RavingStaff.NAME: Raving Staff
TheSimpletonMod:RavingStaff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times.

TheSimpletonMod:ReapAndSow.NAME: Reap and Sow
TheSimpletonMod:ReapAndSow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! Potatoes. NL Add a Harvest to your discard pile.
TheSimpletonMod:ReapAndSow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! Potatoes. NL Add an upgraded Harvest to your discard pile.

TheSimpletonMod:ReleasedKnowledge.NAME: Released Knowledge
TheSimpletonMod:ReleasedKnowledge.DESCRIPTION: Ritual : Add a random Circle card into your hand. NL Exhaust.
TheSimpletonMod:ReleasedKnowledge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ritual : Add a random Circle card into your hand.

TheSimpletonMod:RootDown.NAME: Root Down
TheSimpletonMod:RootDown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Turnips. NL Put a Root Out on the bottom of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

TheSimpletonMod:RootOut.NAME: Root Out
TheSimpletonMod:RootOut.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of your turn, lose !M! Strength. NL Harvest all Turnips. NL Exhaust.

TheSimpletonMod:SaltUponWound.NAME: Salt upon Wound
TheSimpletonMod:SaltUponWound.DESCRIPTION: Enemy immediately loses HP by its Bleed 2 times. NL Apply !M! Bleed.

TheSimpletonMod:ShockAndAwe.NAME: Shock and Awe
TheSimpletonMod:ShockAndAwe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Shuffle 2 random Curse cards into your draw pile.

TheSimpletonMod:SmokeScreen.NAME: Smoke Screen
TheSimpletonMod:SmokeScreen.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Ritual : Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

TheSimpletonMod:SoulCrush.NAME: Soul Crush
TheSimpletonMod:SoulCrush.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Curse cards in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage.

TheSimpletonMod:SoulReap.NAME: Soul Reap
TheSimpletonMod:SoulReap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this kills a non-minion enemy, heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

TheSimpletonMod:SpitefulPlan.NAME: Spiteful Plan
TheSimpletonMod:SpitefulPlan.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Curse card, draw !M! card.
TheSimpletonMod:SpitefulPlan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Curse card, draw !M! cards.

TheSimpletonMod:SpitefulPray.NAME: Spiteful Pray
TheSimpletonMod:SpitefulPray.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL If you have any Curse card in your hand, gain additional [E]. NL Exhaust.
TheSimpletonMod:SpitefulPray.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL If you have any Curse card in your hand, gain additional [E]. NL Exhaust.

TheSimpletonMod:SpitefulStrike.NAME: Spiteful Strike
TheSimpletonMod:SpitefulStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have any Curse card in your hand, gain [E] [E].

TheSimpletonMod:SpreadPlague.NAME: Spread Plague
TheSimpletonMod:SpreadPlague.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Bleed and 3 Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

TheSimpletonMod:StingEye.NAME: Sting Eye
TheSimpletonMod:StingEye.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Bleed.

TheSimpletonMod:Stretching.NAME: Stretching
TheSimpletonMod:Stretching.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Dexterity.

TheSimpletonMod:StunningStrike.NAME: Stunning Strike
TheSimpletonMod:StunningStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Stun. NL Exhaust.

TheSimpletonMod:SurpriseAttack.NAME: Surprise Attack
TheSimpletonMod:SurpriseAttack.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

TheSimpletonMod:TacticalStrike.NAME: Tactical Strike
TheSimpletonMod:TacticalStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional card.
TheSimpletonMod:TacticalStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional cards.

TheSimpletonMod:TroublousMinions.NAME: Troublous Minions
TheSimpletonMod:TroublousMinions.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw this card, add a copy of it into your hand. NL Gain !B! Block and add a Dregs card into your hand. NL Exhaust.

TheSimpletonMod:UltimatePain.NAME: Ultimate Pain
TheSimpletonMod:UltimatePain.DESCRIPTION: Enemy immediately loses HP by its Bleed X times.
TheSimpletonMod:UltimatePain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enemy immediately loses HP by its Bleed X+1 times.

TheSimpletonMod:VitalStrike.NAME: Vital Strike
TheSimpletonMod:VitalStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Bleed, double the damage.

TheSimpletonMod:VoidForm.NAME: Void Form
TheSimpletonMod:VoidForm.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 2 random Curse cards into your draw pile. NL Whenever you draw a Curse, gain !M! Strength.

TheSimpletonMod:WearCloak.NAME: Wear Cloak
TheSimpletonMod:WearCloak.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have any Curse card in your hand, gain [E].

TheSimpletonMod:Wield.NAME: Wield
TheSimpletonMod:Wield.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw cards equal to the number of Unplayable cards in your hand.
